title: Episode 109: Ian Knauer
description:
What do you do when Gourmet Magazine folds, and you lose your job? You become a farmer, of course! On this episode of Let’s Eat In, Cathy Erway is talking with food writer, cook, and author Ian Knauer. Tune in to hear about Ian’s new cookbook entitled The Farm: Rustic Recipes for a Year of Incredible Food; all the recipes are based on farm-to-table food! Hear about Ian’s family farm in Pennsylvania that inspired his cookbook, his homemade hard apple cider made with natural yeast, and the phenomenon of seasonal cookbooks. What has Ian been looking forward to harvest? Tune in to find out, and of course, hear Ian’s ideal date meal. This program has been brought to you by
Tekserve.

“The fact that we have so much selection helps us focus on what’s important and what’s good and, in this case, when to eat what’s good.”

–cookbook author Ian Knauer on Let’s Eat In
